link.script:
{"url":"http://www.ariseschools.org","name":"ARISE Schools","description":"
ARISE Schools is a New Orleans based network of high performing schools which includes ARISE Academy, founded in 2008 located in the Upper Ninth Ward, and Mildred Osborne Charter School, founded in 2013 located in the Kenilworth area.","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/5616de4ee4b054a9e9e6382f/t/561816fbe4b0a09ae2f5dea3/1587593108782/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

{"legalName":"ARISE Schools","address":"3819 Saint Claude Avenue\nNew Orleans, LA, 70117\nUnited States","email":"info@ariseschools.org","telephone":"504-615-6354","sameAs":["https://twitter.com/ARISESchools"],"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"Organization"}

{"address":"3819 Saint Claude Avenue\nNew Orleans, LA, 70117\nUnited States","image":"https://static1.squarespace.com/static/5616de4ee4b054a9e9e6382f/t/561816fbe4b0a09ae2f5dea3/1587593108782/","name":"ARISE Schools","openingHours":", , , , , , ","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"LocalBusiness"}

div.data-layout-label: Mildred Osborne Charter School Header Content

div.h1: The Mission of Mildred Osborne Charter School is to empower scholars through a rigorous and holistic academic experience to succeed in high school, excel in college, and make an impact on their community and world.

blockquote.span: We go above and beyond to achieve greatness. Excellence is a habit.
We are constant learners striving for creative solutions.
We learn with enthusiasm and take pride in everything we do.
We have a shared responsibility. “I am because we are.”
